nodes.excerpt: A single link for founders that allows investors to commit and send funds online. Once the Roll Up Vehicle (RUV) closes, AngelList sends one single wire to the company.
nodes.title: Roll Up Vehicles by AngelList - A single link for all your angel investors
nodes.author: Gabe Perez

localize.description: 为创始人提供一个单一的链接，让投资人可以在线承诺和发送资金。一旦卷帘车(RUV)关闭，AngelList就会向公司发送一条单线。
localize.tagline: 为您的所有天使投资人提供单一链接

localize.description: 爲創始人提供一個單一的鏈接，讓投資人可以在線承諾和發送資金。一旦捲簾車(RUV)關閉，AngelList就會向公司發送一條單線。
localize.tagline: 爲您的所有天使投資人提供單一鏈接

nodes.excerpt: Steady Capital is a web dashboard for retail investors to buy shares of income-generating commercial real estate. Make investments and see financial reports in our dashboard, and get monthly deposits from your investments directly to your bank account.
nodes.title: Steady Capital - Passive income-generating commercial real estate for $100
nodes.author: Dillon Zhang Forrest

localize.description: 稳健资本是一个网络仪表盘，供散户购买创收商业地产的股票。在我们的仪表盘上进行投资和查看财务报告，并从您的投资中直接获得每月存款到您的银行账户。
localize.tagline: 100美元的被动创收型商业地产。

localize.description: 穩健資本是一個網絡儀表盤，供散戶購買創收商業地產的股票。在我們的儀表盤上進行投資和查看財務報告，並從您的投資中直接獲得每月存款到您的銀行賬戶。
localize.tagline: 100美元的被動創收型商業地產。

nodes.excerpt: FarmTogether is a technology-powered investment platform that provides direct access to farmland as an asset class.
nodes.title: FarmTogether - Democratizing farmland investing
nodes.author: Rebecca Bauer

localize.description: FarmTogether是一个由技术驱动的投资平台，它提供了作为资产类别的农田的直接使用权。
localize.tagline: 农田投资民主化

localize.description: FarmTogether是一個由技術驅動的投資平臺，它提供了作爲資產類別的農田的直接使用權。
localize.tagline: 農田投資民主化

nodes.excerpt: The first reliable all-in-one investing, trading, and saving application. A platform for analyzing and executing on quality information, and then sharing thoughts, research, and profits to any social media platform with a button tap. BETA: http://www.tradearies.com/?kid=1F6DV1
nodes.title: Aries - Bridging the stock market gap between retail and wall-street
nodes.author: Reda

localize.description: 第一款可靠的集投资、交易、储蓄于一体的应用。一个对优质信息进行分析和执行的平台，然后通过点击按钮将想法、研究和利润分享到任何社交媒体平台。BETA：http://www.tradearies.com/?kid=1F6DV1
localize.tagline: 缩小散户与墙头草之间的股市差距

localize.description: 第一款可靠的集投資、交易、儲蓄於一體的應用。一個對優質信息進行分析和執行的平臺，然後通過點擊按鈕將想法、研究和利潤分享到任何社交媒體平臺。BETA：http://www.tradearies.com/?kid=1F6DV1
localize.tagline: 縮小散戶與牆頭草之間的股市差距

nodes.excerpt: Money Minx is net worth and investments tracking - ⚡️ Connect with over 23,000 institutions 📈 Stocks, bonds, ETFs, Alternatives and more 👾 Cryptos too 💹 Multi currency support (USD, EUR, GBP, JPY,..) 😉 Compare to other investors 🎟 Investing community

localize.description: Money Minx是净值和投资跟踪 - ⚡️ 连接超过23,000个机构 📈 股票，债券，ETFs，替代产品和更多 👾 Cryptos太 💹 多货币支持（美元，欧元，英镑，日元，...） 😉 与其他投资者比较 🎟 投资社区

nodes.excerpt: Finary is a beautiful portfolio tracker with built-in performance reports 💰 Track all your investments - stocks, crypto, startups.. 🌎 Integrations with 10.000+ banks & investment platforms worldwide 📈 Profit & loss analysis 👉 Give it a try!
nodes.title: Finary - Track your net worth in real-time
nodes.author: Nicolas Dessaigne

localize.description: Finary是一个漂亮的投资组合跟踪器，内置业绩报告 💰 跟踪你所有的投资 - 股票，加密，创业公司... 🌎 与全球10.000+银行和投资平台整合 📈 盈利和亏损分析 👉 给它一个尝试!

nodes.excerpt: Q.ai Invest is a hands-free approach to investing. It doesn’t just pick stocks and ETFs. It manages your money with institutional-grade, AI-powered investment strategies – totally commission-free! Get started today with as little as $100 for only $10/month.
nodes.title: Q.ai Invest - A hedge fund in your pocket
nodes.author: Stephen Mathai-Davis

localize.description: Q.ai Invest是一种免提的投资方式。它不只是挑选股票和ETF。它通过机构级的人工智能投资策略管理您的资金--完全免收佣金! 今天开始，只需10美元/月，最低100美元。
localize.tagline: 你口袋里的对冲基金

localize.description: Q.ai Invest是一種免提的投資方式。它不只是挑選股票和ETF。它通過機構級的人工智能投資策略管理您的資金--完全免收佣金! 今天開始，只需10美元/月，最低100美元。
localize.tagline: 你口袋裏的對沖基金

nodes.excerpt: Early stage fundraising is hard. Understanding any long-term repercussions make it easier. ⠀ Introducing the Carta SAFE Calculator. ⠀ In just a few clicks you can: -Calculate your future dilution -Compare the impact of pre vs. post money SAFEs
nodes.title: Carta SAFE Calculator - Calculate your future dilution in just a few clicks
nodes.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: 早期阶段的筹款是很难的。了解任何长期的影响，使其更容易。⠀ 介绍Carta SAFE计算器。⠀ 只需点击几下，您就可以。-计算您的未来稀释 -比较资金前与资金后SAFEs的影响。
localize.tagline: 只需点击几下，就能计算出您未来的稀释率。

localize.description: 早期階段的籌款是很難的。瞭解任何長期的影響，使其更容易。⠀ 介紹Carta SAFE計算器。⠀ 只需點擊幾下，您就可以。-計算您的未來稀釋 -比較資金前與資金後SAFEs的影響。
localize.tagline: 只需點擊幾下，就能計算出您未來的稀釋率。

nodes.excerpt: Ark7 is a real estate investment platform where you can buy property shares at as low as $5 to earn passive monthly income and future appreciation. In the meantime, you don’t have to worry about property management because we take care of it.
nodes.title: Ark7 - Real estate investment as easy as stocks
nodes.author: Meng Xu

localize.description: 方舟7号是一个房产投资平台，在这里，您可以以低至5元的价格购买房产股，每月赚取被动收入和未来升值。同时，您不用担心物业管理，因为我们会负责。
localize.tagline: 房产投资像股票一样简单

localize.description: 方舟7號是一個房產投資平臺，在這裏，您可以以低至5元的價格購買房產股，每月賺取被動收入和未來升值。同時，您不用擔心物業管理，因爲我們會負責。
localize.tagline: 房產投資像股票一樣簡單

nodes.excerpt: Alt lets you treat your sports card collection as an investment portfolio. You can buy and sell pre-authenticated cards on our exchange and track the current market value for all your assets with our integrated portfolio management view.
nodes.title: Alt - Invest in sports cards just like stocks
nodes.author: Alexis Ohanian

localize.description: Alt让您把您的运动卡收藏当作一个投资组合。您可以在我们的交易所购买和出售预认证卡，并通过我们的综合投资组合管理视图跟踪您所有资产的当前市场价值。
localize.tagline: 投资体育卡就像投资股票一样

localize.description: Alt讓您把您的運動卡收藏當作一個投資組合。您可以在我們的交易所購買和出售預認證卡，並通過我們的綜合投資組合管理視圖跟蹤您所有資產的當前市場價值。
localize.tagline: 投資體育卡就像投資股票一樣

nodes.excerpt: MakeMyFund enables investors to build and invest in their own fully personalized efunds - without being experts in capital markets. The idea is to deliver 3%-5% higher returns than conventional mutual funds - most of this based on lower cost and tax savings.
nodes.title: MakeMyFund - Personalized virtual equity fund
nodes.author: Swapnil Pawar

localize.description: MakeMyFund使投资者能够建立并投资于自己的完全个性化的电子基金--无需成为资本市场的专家。其理念是提供比传统共同基金高3%-5%的回报率--其中大部分是基于较低的成本和节税。
localize.tagline: 个性化的虚拟股票基金

localize.description: MakeMyFund使投資者能夠建立並投資於自己的完全個性化的電子基金--無需成爲資本市場的專家。其理念是提供比傳統共同基金高3%-5%的回報率--其中大部分是基於較低的成本和節稅。
localize.tagline: 個性化的虛擬股票基金

nodes.excerpt: Archimedes is the investment learning hub for everyone. Make investing a bigger part of your life by learning from a personal curriculum of bite-sized lessons, fun gameplay, and from a trusted community. Sign up and become a better investor today.
nodes.title: Archimedes - Investment learning hub for everyone
nodes.author: Clair Byrd

localize.description: 阿基米德是大家的投资学习中心。通过从个人课程、有趣的游戏和值得信赖的社区学习，让投资成为您生活中更大的一部分。立即注册，成为更好的投资者。
localize.tagline: 每个人的投资学习中心

localize.description: 阿基米德是大家的投資學習中心。通過從個人課程、有趣的遊戲和值得信賴的社區學習，讓投資成爲您生活中更大的一部分。立即註冊，成爲更好的投資者。
localize.tagline: 每個人的投資學習中心

nodes.excerpt: Plasma.Finance is DeFi dashboard which aggregates the most popular DeFi protocols from different blockchains and allows users to manage their DeFi portfolio in one simple interface. You can trade and buy any ERC20 tokens with your Coinbase or Metamask wallet.
nodes.title: Plasma Finance - The easiest way to invest in DeFi & manage crypto portfolio
nodes.author: Ilia Maksimenka

localize.description: Plasma.Finance是DeFi仪表板，它聚合了来自不同区块链的最流行的DeFi协议，允许用户在一个简单的界面上管理他们的DeFi投资组合。您可以使用Coinbase或Metamask钱包交易和购买任何ERC20代币。
localize.tagline: 最简单的投资DeFi和管理加密投资组合的方法。

localize.description: Plasma.Finance是DeFi儀表板，它聚合了來自不同區塊鏈的最流行的DeFi協議，允許用戶在一個簡單的界面上管理他們的DeFi投資組合。您可以使用Coinbase或Metamask錢包交易和購買任何ERC20代幣。
localize.tagline: 最簡單的投資DeFi和管理加密投資組合的方法。

nodes.excerpt: pNeura is a platform that enables entrepreneurs to share their progress and connect with other entrepreneurs and investors. Investors can follow their portfolios with ease. Developed by Appello Software.
nodes.title: pNeura - Entrepreneurs Network - EXPLORE STARTUPS AND FOUNDERS
nodes.author: Michelle Badenhorst

localize.description: pNeura是一个让创业者能够分享他们的进展并与其他创业者和投资者联系的平台。投资者可以轻松地跟踪他们的投资组合。由Appello软件公司开发。

localize.description: pNeura是一個讓創業者能夠分享他們的進展並與其他創業者和投資者聯繫的平臺。投資者可以輕鬆地跟蹤他們的投資組合。由Appello軟件公司開發。

nodes.excerpt: A free tool to help you find startup investors & manage your fundraising process. We help you to find the right person at the right firm. 🔍 Search 1000s of investors 💾 Save them to your FundBoard 🤝 Share them to get find introductions
nodes.title: FundBoard - Build a tailor-fit list of startup investors in minutes

localize.description: 一个免费的工具，帮助你找到创业投资者和管理你的筹资过程。我们帮助您在合适的公司找到合适的人。🔍 搜索1000个投资人 💾 将他们保存到您的FundBoard 🤝 分享他们以获得寻找介绍的机会
localize.tagline: 在几分钟内建立一个量身定做的创业投资人名单。

localize.description: 一個免費的工具，幫助你找到創業投資者和管理你的籌資過程。我們幫助您在合適的公司找到合適的人。🔍 搜索1000個投資人 💾 將他們保存到您的FundBoard 🤝 分享他們以獲得尋找介紹的機會
localize.tagline: 在幾分鐘內建立一個量身定做的創業投資人名單。

nodes.excerpt: Enombic is a product for designing your own custom stock indexes, investing in them, and sharing them with your friends. Remix the ARK ETFs, market-cap weight the WSB symbols, or "fork" SPY and set your own custom weights. Then, it's one click to invest!
nodes.title: Enombic - Create your own stock indexes
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

localize.description: Enombic是一款用于设计自己的自定义股指，投资股指，并与朋友分享的产品。重新组合ARK ETF，市值加权WSB符号，或 "分叉 "SPY并设置您自己的自定义权重。然后，就可以一键投资了!
localize.tagline: 创建自己的股票指数

localize.description: Enombic是一款用於設計自己的自定義股指，投資股指，並與朋友分享的產品。重新組合ARK ETF，市值加權WSB符號，或 "分叉 "SPY並設置您自己的自定義權重。然後，就可以一鍵投資了!

nodes.excerpt: Alinea is a mobile investing app for the next generation. We match you to stocks based on your interests and offer bite-sized insights so you can invest in the companies you believe in. Join the waitlist to reserve a spot!

nodes.excerpt: Tiny stocks watcher for the menu bar. Add your favorite tickers to always see the current price. Powered by Yahoo Finance API. Buy on the Mac App Store for $0.99 or free install via Xcode. For any further information or features, feel free to contact me.
nodes.title: Market Bar - Tiny stocks watcher
nodes.author: Daniil M.

localize.description: 微小的股票观察者的菜单栏。添加您喜欢的股票，随时查看当前价格。由雅虎财经API提供支持。在 Mac App Store 上购买，售价 0.99 美元，或通过 Xcode 免费安装。如有任何进一步的信息或功能，请随时联系我。
localize.tagline: 小股票观察者

localize.description: 微小的股票觀察者的菜單欄。添加您喜歡的股票，隨時查看當前價格。由雅虎財經API提供支持。在 Mac App Store 上購買，售價 0.99 美元，或通過 Xcode 免費安裝。如有任何進一步的信息或功能，請隨時聯繫我。
localize.tagline: 小股票觀察者

nodes.excerpt: Stonksfolio is a free community-supported project that makes it easy to track multiple stock, ETF and crypto investments in a single place. ⠀ It shows historical performance and a number of useful metrics that can help you decide how to tune your investments.
nodes.title: Stonksfolio - Gain insight into the performance of stock & ETF investments
nodes.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: Stonksfolio是一个由社区支持的免费项目，它可以在一个地方轻松跟踪多种股票、ETF和加密投资。⠀它显示了历史业绩和一些有用的指标，可以帮助你决定如何调整你的投资。
localize.tagline: 深入了解股票和ETF的投资表现。

localize.description: Stonksfolio是一個由社區支持的免費項目，它可以在一個地方輕鬆跟蹤多種股票、ETF和加密投資。⠀它顯示了歷史業績和一些有用的指標，可以幫助你決定如何調整你的投資。
localize.tagline: 深入瞭解股票和ETF的投資表現。

nodes.excerpt: Watch for GME squeeze updates!
nodes.title: Is The Squeeze Squoze? - Is GME Squoze Yet?
nodes.author: Jeff Needles

localize.tagline: GME是Squoze了吗？
